## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
glimpse(house_elections)
```
```{r}
glimpse(contributions)
```
```{r}
glimpse(committees)
```
```{r}
glimpse(candidates)
```

```{r}
## Iris
cand_party <- candidates %>%
  summarise(total = n(),
            R = sum(cand_party_affiliation == "REP"), D = sum(cand_party_affiliation == "DEM")) %>%
  print()
```
